results.content: Since HTML and CSS are so integral to the structure of a page, it would make sense that there would be exercises to reinforce the concepts and achieve a reasonable goal when the topics are introduced; a HTML/CSS cheatsheet might be a good aid for this.
results.content_html: Since HTML and CSS are so integral to the structure of a page, it would make sense that there would be exercises to reinforce the concepts and achieve a reasonable goal when the topics are introduced; a HTML/CSS cheatsheet might be a good aid for this.
